title: China today. No. 8105
creator_credit: Film Studio of the Peoples Republic of China
brief_description: Shows various views of China: Tanzhesi Temple; Nanjing oil terminal; wedding ceremony of the Yugu nationality; training class for fresh water fish breeding; a panda acrobat.
